simplification: After a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China, the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly scrambled.

original: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
simplification: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a dramatic increase in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

original: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
simplification: On 27 February, due to increasing worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes posted their sharpest falls since 2008. Dow Jones Industrial fell by 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.

original: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
simplification: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.

original: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
simplification: Although Scope Rating GmbH reassured China's soverign credit rating, it still maintained a negative outlook on 28 February.

original: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
simplification: The largest fall in stocks was on 16 March based on coronavirus fears.

original: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
simplification: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.

original: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
simplification: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.

original: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
simplification: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.

original: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
simplification: The closing of public places, travel attractions and advice of government against any travel all over the world affected the tourism the most.

original: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
simplification: Numerous airlines collapsed due to the cancellation of flights and lowered demand.

original: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
simplification: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.

original: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
simplification: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.

original: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
simplification: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season linked with the Chinese New Year holiday.

original: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
simplification: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments. The Annual New Year festivals and privately owned companies and tourist attraction such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland also closed down.

original: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
simplification: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions such as the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional templer fairs have been closed to prevent mass gatherings.

original: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
simplification: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday. Most workplaces were insteucted not to re-open until 10 February.

original: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
simplification: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.

original: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
simplification: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency. It also closed schools until March and cancelled its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.

original: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
simplification: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.

original: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
simplification: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.

original: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
simplification: Compared to February, this resulted in a 33-43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March.

original: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
simplification: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures such as increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events. According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.

original: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
simplification: In January and February 2020, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs during the height of the epidemic.

original: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
simplification: Nearly 300 million rural migrant workers in China, have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province. More than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid in March 2020.

original: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
simplification: According to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, the coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%. The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant daily wage workers unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment. Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.

original: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
simplification: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits. 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme. Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.

original: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
simplification: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.

original: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
simplification: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been greatly affected by the pandemic. It has impacted operation of organisations' and individuals both employed and independent globally.

original: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
simplification: Arts and culture sector organizations tried to maintain their mission. They tried to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.

original: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
simplification: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed. Exhibitions, events and performances were cancelled or postponed.

original: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
simplification: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Another recent and increasingly consequence of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.

original: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
simplification: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome have been cancelled.

original: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
simplification: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays. Some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television. Others are offering drive-in worship.

original: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
simplification: The Roman Catholic of Rome and St.Peter's Sqaure's closed its churches, chapels and emptied of Christian piligrims. Other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.

original: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
simplification: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and closed the shrines.Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims and its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.

original: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
simplification: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.

original: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
simplification: Most major sporting events such as 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season have either been postponed or cancelled.

original: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
simplification: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July 2021. The International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021. Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.

original: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
simplification: Many online gambling sites reported significant increase in rates of new sign ups as many gamblers move online. The entertainment industry has also been affected with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.

original: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
simplification: All performances were suspended in large theatres including broadways.

original: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
simplification: As an alternative to traditional live performance, some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet.  It includes live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.

original: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
simplification: Many turn to humour and distraction online amid certainty. Numerous coronavirus themed internet memes have spread.

original: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
simplification: Ever since the outbreak of COVID-19, increased prejudice, xenophobia, and racism has been noted towards people of Chinese and East Asian descent. It can also be seen against people from hotspots in Europe, United States and other countries.

original: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
simplification: Especiallyin counties like Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region, cases of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed.

original: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
simplification: While the majority of cases had still been confined to China, reports from February show that various group worldwide expressed that the Chinese were deserving of the virus or receiving justified retribution .

original: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
simplification: A rise in anti-Chinese sentiment can also be seen in some countries in Africa.

original: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
simplification: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.

original: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
simplification: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.

original: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
simplification: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Ita could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia. Italy was the the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19. Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.

original: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
simplification: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.

original: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
simplification: The Chinese and other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racists abuse and assaults.

original: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
simplification: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus". Critics considered that term to be racist and anti-Chinese.

original: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
simplification: Buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary were attacked by protestors.

original: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
simplification: Northeast Indian students studying in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak. Northeast India shares a border with China.

original: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
simplification: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and was avenged by God.

original: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
simplification: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese as erroneous by consulate in Kolkata. The pandemics has aggrevated xenophobia and racism against non-Chinese residents in China. Foreigners are described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".

original: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
simplification: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.

original: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
simplification: Many publishers made outbreak related scientific papers available with open access.

original: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
simplification: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.

original: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
simplification: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.

original: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
simplification: RT-PCR detects the coronavirus' RNA and confirms the presence of the virus in the sample.

original: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
simplification: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

original: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
simplification: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.

original: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
simplification: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.

original: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
simplification: Antibody tests show how many people have had the diseases. It also detects those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who didn't have any symtoms.

original: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
simplification: From the results of this test, an accurate death rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be confirmed.

original: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
simplification: As of March 2020, no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population due to limited testing.

original: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
simplification: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population. However, there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.

original: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
simplification: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates. The fatality rates are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.

original: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
simplification: Real time reverse transcription chain reaction(rRT-PCR) test can be done using samples such as nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample

original: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
simplification: The C-team had a meeting last night to discuss the approach and schedule for the coming days and months.

original: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
simplification: We have thought about an appropriate response to the current situation and the best way to keep the organisation sustainable during this time.

original: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
simplification: Overwhelmingly, we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.

original: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
simplification: If you need to take a step back, that is okay.

original: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
simplification: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers.

original: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
simplification: We expect you to work for about 4 hours per day, or 20 hours per week, until further notice.

original: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
simplification: We are not declaring a holiday. However, the mission can use you if you can work more normal hours.

original: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
simplification: We know that the world is unpredictable right now, and your wellbeing is our priority.

original: We are not tracking your time.
simplification: We are not tracking your time.

original: If you are sick, do not work.
simplification: If you are feeling unwell, do not work.

original: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
simplification: This should go without saying, but we are saying it.

original: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
simplification: You can just inform your manager as sick days or PTO will not be needed. You can help your team to reorganise the calendar. Make sure the key areas of work are covered when adjusting the schedule.

original: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
simplification: If you have been tested positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan know. We can arrange for support and ensure you get the appropriate attention from the management.

original: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
simplification: Hourly staff will be fully paid.

original: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
simplification: As we mentioned before, we are recommitting to honour our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.

original: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
simplification: Everyone will be paid as if they were working their usual hours during normal circumstances.

original: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
simplification: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

original: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
simplification: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan to allow more time for budgeting. Employees can then prioritize critical work, self-care and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work reduced hours over the next few weeks.

original: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
simplification: This extension of the timelines greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.

original: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
simplification: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week. We will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.

original: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
simplification: We thank the APP team for your leadership in this.

original: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
simplification: Office status, exposure, and cleaning.

original: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
simplification: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

original: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
simplification: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.

original: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
simplification: They used a hospital grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface including the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.

original: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
simplification: The building is implementing its own duty-of-care protocol with products that support the safety of their tenants.

original: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
simplification: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared when we decide to return.

original: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
simplification: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us, and all DC based stuff.

original: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
simplification: In line with the guidance shared with San Francisco, our DC office moved to a fully work-from-home setup last week.

original: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
simplification: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have been discussing about renting a location in Brooklyn.

original: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
simplification: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.

original: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
simplification: Some of our colleagues are working from home for the first time.

original: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
simplification: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment and wanted to offer you some advice.

original: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
simplification: We will use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.

original: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
simplification: We are in this together and here to help however we can.

original: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
simplification: You can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information on Office Wiki in the meantime.

original: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
simplification: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.

original: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
simplification: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who live in countries that are significantly affected.

original: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
simplification: Please do not hesitate to inform and work with the CRT, if you have any questions about travel, events a major workstream or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with.

original: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
simplification: We are here to provide support and communicate as needed.

original: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
simplification: Please email Bryan Judan, the Director of HR International Global Operations, if you have a confidential or sensitive matter.

original: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
simplification: None of these changes should be seen as neglect of our work and responsibilities.

original: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
simplification: They are rather a recognition that our work and responsibilities will likely need to adapt at this moment in a way we have not in the past.

original: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
simplification: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support one another, continue to work to provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.

original: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
simplification: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.

original: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
simplification: It is time to support one another for now and create space for important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.

original: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
simplification: We need all of you to make that happen. We need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.

original: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
simplification: Please wash you hands and do not touch your face!
